message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product at a price of $1800000. It's a rare opportunity to own a truly unique item, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1800000 is above my budget.  I'm interested in purchasing, but I can only offer $1450000 at this time.  Let's see if we can reach a mutually agreeable price.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $1450000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1650000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.

Alice, I understand your position, but $1650000 is still a bit too high for me.  To make progress, I'm willing to offer $1550000.  I believe this is a fair compromise, and I'm confident this product will be a valuable addition to my collection.

I'm glad we're making progress, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1550000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1675000. This is my final offer, and I believe it's a fair price for the product's value and uniqueness.
